title: Zambia at the 2010 Summer Youth Olympics
text: <a href="Zambia">Zambia</a> competed at the <a href="2010%20Summer%20Youth%20Olympics">2010 Summer Youth Olympics</a>, the inaugural <a href="Youth%20Olympic%20Games">Youth Olympic Games</a>, held in <a href="Singapore">Singapore</a> from 14 August to 26 August 2010.
